name: Diabetasol
description: For people with diabetes, having a balanced daily nutrition intake is crucial to keep blood sugar levels stable. Diabetasol is a Balanced Nutrition for Diabetes with Vitadigest (mix of slow release carbohydrate and fiber) which is Clinically Proven to perform. It has a low Glycemic Index (GI) profile and keep you feeling full for longer. Diabetasol contains High Calcium and Fiber levels, is Cholesterol Free, and contains 11 vitamins and 6 minerals. Drink Diabetasol daily to help maintain blood sugar levels. Diabetasol provides solutions for people with diabetes with a wide range of products including nutrition powder, sweetener safe for diabetics and daily snacks for diabetics.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
